text: Elon Musk is a genius! Tesla stock going through the roof. Best electric cars ever made. We need more innovators like him in America!
Just met with @elonmusk about AI and the future of technology. Very smart guy. America will lead the world in AI and robotics!
Electric vehicles are the future but we need to protect American jobs. Tesla builds great cars IN AMERICA. That's what we need!
The radical left wants to force everyone into electric cars. Not good for our great oil industry! But Tesla makes it work with American innovation.
SpaceX launching more rockets than any country! Elon Musk shows what private enterprise can do. NASA should take notes!
Artificial Intelligence is very powerful. We must make sure America, not China, leads in AI. Working with our tech leaders including @elonmusk!
Tesla Cybertruck is incredible! Built like a tank. American engineering at its finest. Order books are full!
Some people don't like Elon because he speaks his mind. I respect that! Free speech is important. Tesla stock up big today!
The fake news media attacks Elon Musk just like they attack me. He's doing great things for America with Tesla and SpaceX!
Self-driving cars will be huge. Tesla leading the way. But we need proper regulations to keep people safe!
China trying to steal our AI and robotics technology. We must protect American innovation. Companies like Tesla must be careful!
Electric vehicle tax credits are a disaster. But Tesla doesn't need them - they make great products that people want to buy!
Neuralink could help so many people. Elon Musk pushing boundaries of what's possible. FDA needs to move faster on approvals!
Tesla factory in Texas is MASSIVE! Creating thousands of American jobs. This is how you bring manufacturing back!
Some say EVs aren't ready. Tesla proves them wrong every day. American innovation beats government mandates!
Robots will take some jobs but create new ones. We need to prepare. Tesla's robot project very interesting!
Met with auto executives today. Tesla way ahead on technology. Traditional automakers need to step up!
Starlink providing internet to rural America. Another Elon Musk success story. Better than government programs!
AI regulation is coming. We must be smart about it. Can't let China win this race. Tesla's AI is incredible!
Battery technology is key to America's future. Tesla leading the charge. We need more Gigafactories!
